It showed him posing with his cabinet behind a golden chainsaw – a callback to the campaign prop Milei wielded at rallies to punctuate his support for spending cuts. An accompanying caption read: 'The best government in history,' News.az reports citing Al Jazeera.

Title: Mozambique opposition leader to pause protests temporarily
Description: Mozambique’s opposition candidate Venancio Mondlane said Monday he is considering to call off protests for five days to allow entry of international organizations to investigate alleged human rights abuses by police, News.az reports citing foreign media.

Title: UN special rapporteur advocates for worldwide medical boycott of ...
Description: Francesca Albanese, the UN special rapporteur on Palestine, on Monday urged medical professionals around the world to sever ties with Israel as a direct response to the destruction of Gaza’s health care system, News.az reports citing foreign media.
